name: Vivi for Boobs 'em up
detailed_description:
Vivi is a new personage for the game Boobs 'em up. She has sexy magnificent body. Do you think she has more chances to make a good career as a prostitute? Do you want to try how good she would be on the street?

This DLC content is available from the game, on the room where you select personages.

Born in Geneva, Switzerland, Vivi loves animals and nature. When she has a free time she always goes to the zoo or to aquarium.

When Vivi was like 9 she went to this aquarium thing and it was a pretty amusing trip overall. But then suddenly she just kind of saw these jellyfish without any tentacles floating around in the water and was like “oh cool.”

The next day at school, the teacher asked pupils what they had done over the weekend. Now normally Vivi never raise her hand. But she did this time. Vivi fucking did it this time. The worst possible time. So she raised her hand and everyone was obviously shocked to see her hand up in the air so the teacher said “yes?” And after confirming the fact that teacher picked Vivi, she said:

“I saw this jelly fish in the aquarium and I thought it was really cool because it didn’t have any -testacles-.” and then like the classroom just emerged with so much laughter and Vivi had no clue what was going on so she pleaded her friend to explain what was so funny that even THE TEACHER WAS LAUGHING AND VIVI WAS GOING WTF.

So eventually Vivi's friend explained to her (it literally took 2 hours of convincing) and then of course Vivi was pretty embarrassed but the thing is the teacher then asked her if she could tell this to the other teachers and that’s the story of how Vivi switched schools.

Help Vivi to take her place on the street!

short_description: Vivi is a new personage for the game Boobs 'em up
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8 or later
  • Processor: 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible video card with at least 512 VRAM
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.5 or later
  • Processor: Intel 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card with at least 128 VRAM
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS (or similar, Debian-based distro)
  • Processor: 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
